description.value:
You've mastered combat practices that let you get up close and bring down perpetrators alive.

You can use your Intelligence modifier on attack rolls when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Devise a Stratagem]{Devise a Strategem} if you're using a weapon of the club group in one hand (like a club, staff, or sap), in addition to the usual weapons, and those Strikes qualify for your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Strategic Strike].

Additionally, you can make any of your Strikes nonlethal without taking the normal -2 penalty.
